channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Strategic Quantitative Solutions

item.title: Data Science in Trading - Cross-Pollination podcast
item.description: Data Science in Energy Trading and Risk Management Check out my interview with Nbee in her cross-pollination the web link to my Podcast is under Data Science, Trading & Agile Walk into a Bar

item.title: Digital Disruption-Blockchain and AI in Energy Trading
item.description: Blockchain and AI in Energy Trading Fantastic whitepaper by FIS Global I was interviewed for parts of this report. The report is called Digital Disruption in the North American Power and Gas Markets

item.title: Elements of Data Strategy
item.description: Elements of Data Strategy Very interesting article by HBR What is you data strategy New way of looking at Data Management. I specially like the departure from the single source of truth argument to MVOTs. Elements of Data
